storyInfo: Leto sobers up and ascends the mountain, finally meeting the Trilby Asher that Degenbrecher is searching for. The Elder Devotee informs his son of the truth, and Arctosz feels as if he's suffered a heavy blow, immediately taking off to look for Leto.

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What happened...? What's with all the empty bottles on the floor?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Odd. Why was I even sleeping here?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind... you're a good kid...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: ...Arctosz... you... disgrace...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: (Snore)
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Dad?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Eh? Uhâ€¦
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What did you wake me up for?! Can't an old man nap in peace?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: No, hold on, I...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Dad? When did you get home? Why didn't you let me know you were coming?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What happened yesterday? How did we end up sleeping on the floor?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Quit your yapping, it's giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Sir, Master.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I'm so glad you're both finally awake!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Gulo!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What happened here?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The two of you got drunk, and didn't want to stop drinking, and our efforts to convince you to return to your rooms to sleep were in vain.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I could only feed two more batches of firewood to the furnace so it wouldn't get too cold in here.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Sir, do you not remember what happened yesterday?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I... Wait, let me think.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yesterday, yesterday...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I remember. I was to prepare for the banquet to celebrate the completion of Kjeragandr's statue.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Saintess asked me to select the best drinks Kjerag has to offer, so I was tasting them one by one...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And then, after that... I don't remember much.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmph, of course you don't.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You were so drunk you couldn't tell people apart, and even tried to toast to a pillar while hugging it.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: At your age! What an embarrassment!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Enough, Dad. Was I not doing it for the Saintess, for Kjerag?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Gulo's still here, so could you ease up on the scolding, before I lose any more respect!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I always taught you respect is something you earn on your own, so why ask me to leave any for you?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Forget it, I'll bicker with you no longer.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Gulo, where's Rosalind?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: She went up the mountain first thing in the morning, Master.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: She woke up early, while the both of you were still sleeping, and she said to let you sleep a while longer.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I thought the same, so I didn't wake you.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I guess it's fine for her to just leave like that.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Perhaps this was Kjeragandr's plan for the Paleroches.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: They met, they didn't realize, so I guess this means it was just not meant to be... indeed...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What are you riddling about now, Dad?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I vaguely remember a young girl coming here yesterday, but I did drink too much. I can't remember what she looked like.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You say her name was Rosalind? Hmm...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz, come here.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I should not hide this from you.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Same as you made your own choice back then.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What should be done next, is ultimately up to you.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: ...By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: Three generations really drank the night away.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: Even dragged me in with the other guards too.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: Ghhâ€”
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I drank so much.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: And I didn't get any business done at all...
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: ...Since going roundabout didn't work, let's just go head-on.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Judging from the direction, Rosalind probably went up the mountain.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Ohhâ€”This is one of those snowy mountains!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's even more spectacular up close. Kjerag's mountains sure are impressive.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm a little dizzy. Really went overboard on the drinks last night.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wonder if those guys are awake yet. Why didn't the Doctor tell me how enthusiastic Kjerag people can be?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I should give them something as thanks when I get down the mountain later...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sheesh, it's freezing. The wind's pretty painful.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If I remember right... you're supposed to climb up this mountain on your own to prove your faith to Kjeragandr?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's really tall.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But since I'm already here, I might as well try.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The purest air from up in the mountains?
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: Sounds pretty good to me. Do you take cards here?
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: Alright, then give me two boxes. Send them to the Burdenpeak Hotel, room 606.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: Woah, Zofia... you're buying even more stuff.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist B

attributes.content: Didn't you buy four boxes of mountain spring water yesterday? How are we going to bring it all back?
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist B

attributes.content: Don't be silly! Who says we have to bring them home ourselves?
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: I'll send a box each to MÅ‚ynar and Margaret. I probably haven't even bought enough yet.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: Kjerag's air and water are plenty impressive. The Black Knight came here a good long while ago, so she should be living pretty well now.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: Alright, enough of that. I hear you have to climb Kjerag's mountains yourself, as a show of devotion.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: Come on! Let's get climbing!
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist A

attributes.content: They do mention as much in the travel brochure.
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist B

attributes.content: Let's see who can reach the summit first, Zofia!
attributes.name: Foreign Tourist B

attributes.content: Riley, why didn't you tell them we have a cable car that goes up the mountain?
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Hohoho. The tourists have their own ideas, who am I to tell them otherwise?
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Fair enough...
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Seems like tourists are the only ones who like to climb these days.
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: They're right though.
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Come! Let's go take the cable car!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Really? Won't Kjeragandr see it as a lack of faith?
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Nonsense! Kjeragandr granted us this convenience because She loves Her people!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Insisting on climbing would show a lack of faith in Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'huh?'
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: We're all Kjeragandr's children. As long as you respect Her and keep Her in your heart, She'll protect us all!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Whew. You can actually ride a cable car up the mountain?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Why are tourist spots the same everywhere...? I'd better follow the locals.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Even though I don't know what it means to have faith in Kjeragandr at all.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But Kjeragandr must be protecting Kjerag, judging by how things are going?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey, old man in front!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Can you tell me where to get cable car tickets? Thanks for pointing the way!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sir, please hold on.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Who are you? What's with the getup?
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: I'm a reporter from Victoria, you see.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: People praise the Kjeragandr statue, but surely building it must have been a waste of resources. I'm currently collecting someâ€”
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Get lost!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: My son who works on the statue sends me money every month, and even calls me to tell me how good work is over there.
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: You foreigners are just salty about how wonderful our Kjerag is!
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Then, why hasn't he returned?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: He said he signed some agreement, so he has to stay there.
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: What was it again?
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Non-disclosure.
attributes.name: Kjerag Youth

attributes.content: Do you need an NDA to build a statue?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I'm warning you, foreigner. Any more guff out of you and I'll give you a taste of my walking stick.
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd they go?
attributes.name: Kjerag Elder

attributes.content: Hm~ Hmm-hmm-hm~ Praise Kjeragandr...â™ª
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Brave Burdenbeasts~ Brave people~ Kjeragandr guides us~ To protect our homeland, hm hmm~â™ª
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Hmm, Hm-hm-hmm...â™ª
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Huh? The snow here doesn't seem right...
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Yow!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Careful.
There's a trap down there.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You alright?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Oh, Madam Degenbrecher!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Where did this hole come from...? That Riley must have dug it out to catch game!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Many, many thanks. I would have fallen down the hole, if it weren't for you.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Do you have business on the mountain today, Madam?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Anything we can help you with? I have plans with Riley, Leone, and the other guys to go up the mountain today, so just let us know if you need anything!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I have a bit of work to do, but I'll be fine on my own.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Are you and Old Riley still drinking with the Victorians?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Yeah, we've been competing to see who can drink more, and it's a tie, at the moment!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: None of us are giving up, because it'd be an embarrassment for Master Enciodes and the Saintess if we lost to those Victorians!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Also, they just suddenly came in here and set up camp. What do you think is going on?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I've no proper education, but even I know a sudden flood of people here, all hale and healthy even, can't possibly be a good thing!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: That's why Riley and I were thinking we could keep an eye on them for Sir Enciodes with the drinking, at the very least.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: So don't worry. We'll definitely win!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Fine, it would be great if you could drink till they puke.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Just call me if you can't. Don't push yourselves.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Did you decide to watch the Victorians on your own?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Hehe, we thought it up with the other villagers. All of us agreed to it!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: We've been living much better these days, and since we now know how good things can be, we're not gonna let anyone ruin it for us.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: But Madam, I should be honest with you, just don't get angry with me.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Sure, go on.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I just wanted to say, these Victorians we've been drinking with.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: We've come to know them pretty well over the past month, and brushing the other stuff aside, they aren't bad guys.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: They don't cause too much trouble, even when drunk, and sometimes they come over to help out with work.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: There's a guy with bones about as old as mine. He only goes a little mad when he's drunk, but he doesn't do much other than strip off his clothes to try and swim in the snow. I saw his back then, it was in bad shape.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I don't know what he has suffered, but it hurts to even look at. It hurts to think about now.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I might as well tell you this.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: A Victorian Viscount has come to join the celebrations for Kjeragandr's statue, and he's brought his personal army along.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Most of them are veterans who have been fighting alongside him for a long time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: There's no need to think too much, just enjoy your drinks together.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: *sigh* I don't get it, what's the difference between a personal and regular army?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: But they did look far from young, and a few of them seem to have stones growing on their bodies.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: That should be the uh, stone disease, I've seen in the news before?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: ...Oripathy.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Most of the time, nothing happens when you come into contact with it, so you needn't be too worried.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But you should still take some precautions.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You can go to Rhodes Island's office in the city or the newly built hospital for information on how to protect yourself.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That we know, so don't you worry, Madam.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I just wanted to have a chat with you anyways. I wouldn't dare to disturb Sir Enciodes or Sir Gnosis.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're saying I look idle?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I mean, them Sirs are busy with their big projects all day long, so it'd be no good for us to disturb them.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: You help us out regularly, even though you're so busy too. We know you're on the same side as us. You're one of us!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: One of you...
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Wait, no. I mean, those Sirs are our people too.
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I'm bad with words, but you know what I mean!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Am I wasting your time, Madam?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's something I need to trouble you and the rest on the mountain for.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Just say the word!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Help me find a pretentious Victorian.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: A what?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: He wears a top hat and a black coat with the collar covering his face. Some gemstones too.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's easy to spot such a conspicuous figure.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What's this fella doing with that sort of outfit in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Probably something stupid.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Alright, leave it to us!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: I'll send over Old Leones' Burdenbeast the moment we get any news!
attributes.name: Carefree Villager

attributes.content: Are you serious, Dad?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The girl yesterday... She's, she's Rosalind? My daughter?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...Sigh.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I doubt I'm wrong. The girl looks just like you, and Tatyana too.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: My eyes are still good enough, I'm not wrong.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Really...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: My... daughter...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hahaha! I did say she was a good kid! Good stature, and character even! Wonderful!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, Rosalind... She looks like me?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yes, like me, I remember now. She has the same hair color!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Her eyes and mouth are Tatyana's, especially her eyes... they're exactly the same! So pretty...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...Time flies. Little Rosalind has already grown so big, in just the blink of an eye...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait, did she go up the mountain?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: When is she coming back? Will she come back?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz, there's something else...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: We can talk about that later. I have to prepare some gifts for my daughter!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I remember she loved baked sweet cheese and beast stew, when she was little, so I'm off to buy some now!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Tatyana... is she here too? Does she not want to see me? Then I, I...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Alright! No matter, I'll head straight up the mountain and give them to Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And then I'll ask her about Tatyana...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What is it?! I need to hurryâ€”
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: ...Just. Stay. You need to hear this.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Arctosz stops in his tracks from his father's yelling, and an ill omen stirs uncontrollably in his heart.
Perhaps it's his hangover, but a sudden headache descends on him, his stomach seems to drop to the floor, and his back feels as if something cold is creeping up on him.
Only now does Arctosz realize his father's back, which he has not seen in a long time, is slightly stooped, like a wilting tree, no longer tall and upright as he remembered.
But the dry and aged voice of the devotee continues, undeterred by Arctosz's panic.
Rosalind told me she and her mother had been living in Ursus since they left.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: She was too young to remember anything of this place.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: She said she never knew who her father was, all the time she grew up.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: And this time she's here not only to see our Kjeragandr's statue, but also...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: She's brought back her mother's remains.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Ill omens always seem to bear out.
The wind and snow roaring outside their home, the flames flickering inside the furnace, and even their indistinguishable breathing all seem to freeze for a moment.
...What?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Remains...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: B-But, Tatyana was so young. How could she...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't believe it... how can that be...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I heard it from the girl myself.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What happened back then... it was Clan Paleroche that failed mother and daughter.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I carry the shame in my heart, but not regret.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What about you, Arctosz?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Fine, it doesn't matter what you want to say. There's no point telling me.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Your father is no perfect man, nor a saint, and certainly not the victim here.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: This old man is too old to hear you out, let alone offer any advice.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I only wish to spend the rest of my days sweeping the dust at Kjeragandr's feet.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: But you... should think carefully.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Tatyana... Rosalind...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir, Master!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Matriarch Ratatos is here, she says there's something urgent to discuss!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Ugh. The place reeks of booze...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The ceremony's tomorrow, Arctosz. Don't you drink too much and ruin it all.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm in no mood to play with you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Just tell me what happened. You're not the type to make social calls, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Heheh, you sure know me well.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Fine, I'll get straight to the point, Arctosz. I came here to tip you off.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I still recall that you married an Ursine woman, despite your family's objections, and even had a child with her?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Something happened to the Silverashes, and soon after your wife left Kjerag with daughter in tow. This affair was kept within the tri-clans, but it was no secret to us.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Hmph, I see your nose is as sharp as ever.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm here to tell you about your daughter, the girl named Rosalind.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What happened to her?! You better not be taking advantage the situation!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: She has nothing to do with our clan business!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm not here to settle any old scores, but her untimely return is really unfortunate.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Do you know where she is right now?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: She's probably already in the sights of a Victorian spy.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Finally!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But the cable car only goes up this far, and I have to climb the rest myself?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, the summit isn't that far anyway.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I could still see a few tourists earlier, but now there's no one else around.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: White everywhere... Sheesh, it's a little scary.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...How... unlucky...
Wh-What was that?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Ever since I came to Kjerag... Not a single thing has gone smoothly...
Who's that? C-Come out! Don't even think you can scare me!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is that... a hole?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Who could be so bored as to dig a hole by the trail? No, this can't be just a hole...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's a trap!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sure enough. A trap indeed.
Watch your step, Madam.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Also, if it's not too much of a bother, could I trouble you to pull me up?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
